1611173019_1BRGE2hVZLhaE4fH39w4CPdDz4hbB.body:
ZeroMail only works inside a zeronet network.
the benefit of this is that messages are encrypted inside this network and no one can read them except the sender and receiver.

> [quantumkitty](#comment_561_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): ZeroMail gives you encrypted peer-to-peer communication. The ability to send messages that will never be read by anyone else on the planet, not even secret service agents. The better question would be.. what would be the use in sending mail from ZeroMail, to Gmail?

well written
